name: Zambi
description:
In the year 12020 H.E., the ancients spirits of light and dark awaken to reclaim the earth. You've had enough, and you're taking the situation to the manager (of hell).

Everything in game was made during the Jam! - No pre-made assets, songs, sounds, etc were used at all!

Zambi was made in under 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 jam.

Pop into our discord for a chat!
